tourBios.exmtStatus: 34th Nationwide Tour Qualifier at the 2010 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh: Missed the cut at 2008 Open Championship, his only PGA TOUR start.
tourBios.personal: Has worked stacking shelves at a supermarket...Lists Jim Bardan in Queensland as an instructor...Says holing putts when it counts is his biggest thrill in golf and traveling the world is his biggest thrill outside the game...Favorite course to play is Crans Montana in Switzerland, site of the 2010 Omega European Masters. Would like to play Pebble Beach and August National. Manchester United is his favorite team. "Entourage" is his favorite TV show, and "Point Break" is his favorite movie. Snoop Dogg is his favorite entertainer, and boxer Manny Pacquiao is his father athlete to watch. Singapore, Los Angeles, Las Vegas and Florence are his favorite places to visit. Phuket, Thailand, Los Angeles and Las Vegas are his favorite vacation spots...Superstitions include using a 19th-century coin from Florence, Italy, to mark his ball...Would round out his dream foursome with Michael Jordan, Cameron Diaz and Snoop Dogg, with his father caddying...Enjoys listening to rap music...Charity work includes World Vision, an organization that sponsors children around the world. He sponsors a child (Milly) in Colombia...Has one sister....Attended St. Brendan's High School.
tourBios.priorYearSeason: Missed the cut in his first and only two starts on the Nationwide Tour.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T29th in 2011 at the Cox Classic Presented by Lexus of Omaha.
